text: Hemipilia limprichtii is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Hemipilia limprichtii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Endemic orchids of China limprichtii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hemipilia limprichtii
